channel.title: All Phase Masonry
channel.description: Recent content on All Phase Masonry

item.title: Concrete Slabs
item.description: Your home deserves the best. Concete slabs designed to fit the look and feel of your existing landscaping. We’ll apply the finishing of your choice, including stamped or dyed.

item.title: Excavation and Hauling
item.description: Our heavy equipment crew will make simple work of your out-dated and unwanted structures.

item.title: Fencing
item.description: Using only the best materials, our fences…

item.title: Retaining Walls
item.description: Custom-built retaining walls reduce the impact of erosion around your home and prevent potential costly repairs. Depending on your design, we build retaining walls from a variety of materials: Moss Rock Blue Rock Mixed Rock CMU Blocks

item.title: Stairs
item.description: Enhance your home’s outdoor space by adding beautiful stone or poured concrete stairs. Our expert masons will work with you to design the perfect stairs for your project that compliments your existing yard. We build stairs structually sound stairs using: Stone with concrete topper Poured concrete Floating

item.title: Stone Walls
item.description: Our stone walls are one-of-a-kind. Whether you prefer a traditional groutless rock wall or a grouted wall, we’ll design and build you the best wall that’ll last for many decades. We offer different rock types: Moss Rock Blue Rock Mixed Rock

item.title: Makakilo Blue Rock Retaining Wall with Stairway
item.description: This project was completed on a beautiful Makakilo home. We constructed a terraced retaining wall using blue rock and installed a new stairway with a concrete patio. We excavated and constructed new wall to fit the slope the home was on. We built a new concrete landing perfect size for entertaining and stairway for ease of travel down each terrace. #slide-window { position: relative; width: 500px; height: 300px; overflow: hidden; top: 0px; left: 0px; } #slides-list { width: 500px; height: 300px; position: absolute; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; -webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0.

item.title: Landscaping in Makaha Valley
item.description: This Project wanted a Exterior that match the beautiful Makaha Scenery. A Retaining Wall, Tropical Plants, & Sod Installation. See Landscaping in Makaha Valley portfolio on Yelp!

item.title: Pupukea - Moss Rock Wall
item.description: This Country Side Home in Pupukea wanted to replace there old chain link fence at the entrance with something that matched there lush landscape. Moss Rock Wall are a popular choice for Hawaii Homeowners, for durability and the tropical aesthetic it’s known for.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: About
item.description: Established in 2010, All Phase Construction has over 20+ years of craftsmanship in Masonry all throughout the islands of Hawaii. Skills and knowledge of all Concrete and Rock work passed down from my Father and peers throughout the industry has allowed me to develop a keen eye for beautifying your home all the while offering you the best options for Quality and Safety in a timely manner at Kama’aina Prices. Give us a call & Let’s Make You, Ohana!

item.title: Testimonials
item.description: Visit our Yelp page for updated photos and reviews!

item.title: Contact
item.description: Get your FREE ESTIMATE! Complete the form and someone from our team will contact you to discuss your project ideas.
